Ntuple production

Ntuple production

Ntuples are produced starting from ALCARECO, ALCARECOSIM or ALCARERECO files. All commands should be executed from the Calibration/ALCARAW_RECO directory.

alcareco_datasets.dat, alcarereco_datasets.dat provide the useful informations to build the list of files on EOS and process them. as for the alcareco and alcaraw productions, you have to provide such informations using the parseDatasetFile.sh script with the right book-keeping file.

### from alcareco ## for data: ./scripts/prodNtuples.sh `parseDatasetFile.sh alcareco_datasets.dat | grep {string to select your dataset}` --type=ALCARECO --json jsonFile.txt --json_name ## for MC: ./scripts/prodNtuples.sh `parseDatasetFile.sh alcareco_datasets.dat | grep {string to select your dataset}` --type=ALCARECOSIM

### from alcarereco Better to use the quick script, but if you want to process only one specific dataset: ./scripts/prodNtuples.sh `parseDatasetFile.sh alcarereco_datasets.dat | grep {string to select your dataset}` --type=ALCARERECO

Generated on 30 Jul 2014 for ECALELF by  1.6.1
